title: Introducing: I.AM.L.
body:
For the first minute of **I.**

**AM.L.’s** debut track you’d be forgiven for thinking that she’s just another singer/songwriter with a great voice, fantastic production, but little else in the way of originality, yet when _Lionheart_ kicks in, it completely changes the atmosphere of the entire song. Vibrant and brilliantly over the top, it’s one of my favourite debut outings of the year, and ear marks I.AM.L as one to watch for the future. It’s the sort of track I imagine Ellie Goulding might have come up with had she been raised on Björk, Bat For Lashes and Lykke Li. **I.AM.L** is Brighton’s **Laura May**, check out her debut track below.
